entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High zero with temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High zero with temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 19 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the evening then clearing. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023
